name.baseName: Electricity production ; Electricity ; Thermal power (11.8%) + hydropower (62.8%) + wind power (7.5%) + solar power (17.9%)

dataSetInformation.common:generalComment: Forms of electricity generation include thermal power, hydropower, wind power and solar power
电力产生形式包括火力发电、水力发电、风力发电和太阳能发电

time.common:timeRepresentativenessDescription: Calculated based on data from the 2019 Energy Statistics Yearbook
根据2019年能源统计年鉴数据计算

technology.technologicalApplicability: This electricity generation data set is intended for applications in Life Cycle Assessment (LCA) of products or services that require a breakdown of the electricity mix. The electricity produced is used across various sectors, ranging from industrial manufacturing, commercial operations, to residential energy consumption. The electricity generation forms described include thermal power, hydropower, wind power, and solar power, each with its respective contribution to the overall electricity mix.
本电力生成数据集旨在用于需要电力混合比例的产品或服务的生命周期评估（LCA）应用。所产生的电力应用于各个行业，从工业制造到商业运营再到居民能源消费都有涉及。所描述的电力生成方式包含火电、水电、风电和太阳能发电，每种各自对整体电力混合比例有所贡献。

dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.dataTreatmentAndExtrapolationsPrinciples: For the accounting method, please refer to the "Enterprise Greenhouse Gas Emissions Accounting Methods and Reporting Guidelines for Power Generation Facilities". Different forms of power generation and fuel consumption come from Chapter 3 (Energy Production) and Chapter 6 (Regional Energy Balance Sheet) in the "China Energy Statistical Yearbook 2020". The fuel parameters such as low calorific value and carbon content per unit calorific value used to calculate the carbon dioxide emission factor come from the "2019 China Regional Power Grid Carbon Dioxide Baseline Emission Factor Calculation Instructions OM" and the "Enterprise Greenhouse Gas Emission Accounting Method and Reporting Guide for Power Generation Facilities" 》
核算方法参考《企业温室气体排放核算方法与报告指南 发电设施》。不同形式发电量及燃料用量来自于《中国能源统计年鉴 2020》中的第三章（能源生产） 和第六章（地区能源平衡表）。用于计算二氧化碳排放因子的低位发热量、单位热值含碳量等燃料参数来自于《2019 年度中国区域电网二氧化碳基准线排放因子 OM 计算说明》、《企业温室气体排放核算方法与报告指南 发电设施》

referenceToDataSource.common:shortDescription: 熊若熙. 中国电力生产和消费二氧化碳与污染物排放因子核算. (清华大学, 2023).
熊若熙. 中国电力生产和消费二氧化碳与污染物排放因子核算. (清华大学, 2023).

dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.useAdviceForDataSet: When using this data set for LCA, users should consider the specific electricity mix percentages presented (thermal power 11.8%, hydropower 62.8%, wind power 7.5%, and solar power 17.9%) to reflect the energy profile of the region. Carbon emission factors are calculated based on the 2019 Energy Statistics Yearbook, and accounting methods follow the 'Enterprise Greenhouse Gas Emissions Accounting Methods and Reporting Guidelines for Power Generation Facilities.' Ensure to use appropriate allocation methods when considering multi-output processes and include considerations for regional differences in energy production and carbon intensity. The methodology must also include the evaluation of fuel consumption using parameters such as low calorific value and unit calorific value carbon content.

在使用此数据集进行LCA时，用户应考虑所呈现的具体电力混合比例（火电11.8%，水电62.8%，风电7.5%，太阳能发电17.9%），以反映该地区的能源概况。碳排放因子根据2019年能源统计年鉴数据计算，核算方法遵循《企业温室气体排放核算方法与报告指南 发电设施》。在考虑多产出过程时，确保使用适当的分摊方法，并包括对地区能源生产和碳强度差异的考虑。方法论还必须包括使用低位发热量和单位热值含碳量等参数评估燃料消耗。

review.common:reviewDetails: Inventory: The internal review was done by several iteration steps concerning raw data validation, raw data documentation, representativity, completeness and consistency of modelling with regard to ISO 14040 and 14044.
清单： 内部审查通过几个迭代步骤完成，涉及原始数据验证、原始数据记录、代表性、完整性、与 ISO 14040 和 14044 有关的建模的一致性。

publicationAndOwnership.common:licenseType: Free of charge for all users and uses
